name: SKPaymentQueue
desc: A queue of payment transactions to be processed by the App Store.

items.name: class func canMakePayments() -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether the user is allowed to make payments.

items.name: var storefront: SKStorefront?
items.desc: The current App Store storefront for the payment queue.

items.name: class func `default`() -> Self
items.desc: Returns the default payment queue instance.

items.name: func add(SKPaymentTransactionObserver)
items.desc: Adds an observer to the payment queue.

items.name: var transactionObservers: [SKPaymentTransactionObserver]
items.desc: An array of all active payment queue observers.

items.name: func remove(SKPaymentTransactionObserver)
items.desc: Removes an observer from the payment queue.

items.name: var delegate: SKPaymentQueueDelegate?
items.desc: A delegate that provides information needed to complete transactions.

items.name: var transactions: [SKPaymentTransaction]
items.desc: Returns an array of pending transactions.

items.name: func add(SKPayment)
items.desc: Adds a payment request to the queue.

items.name: func finishTransaction(SKPaymentTransaction)
items.desc: Notifies the App Store that the app finished processing the transaction.

items.name: func restoreCompletedTransactions()
items.desc: Asks the payment queue to restore previously completed purchases.

items.name: func restoreCompletedTransactions(withApplicationUsername: String?)
items.desc: Asks the payment queue to restore previously completed purchases, providing an opaque identifier for the userâ€™s account.

items.name: func showPriceConsentIfNeeded()
items.desc: Asks the system to display the price consent sheet if the user has not yet responded to a subscription price increase.

items.name: func presentCodeRedemptionSheet()
items.desc: Displays a sheet that enables users to redeem subscription offer codes that you configure in App Store Connect.

items.name: func start([SKDownload])
items.desc: Adds a set of downloads to the download list.

items.name: func cancel([SKDownload])
items.desc: Removes a set of downloads from the download list.
